news.content:
Artheon and ThreeFold joined forces to create the world's largest VR database of art 🎨 and cultural heritage – owned by everyone and made for everyone.

🔜 Coming to the ThreeFold Grid End of Q3 / Beginning Q4.

Take a peak at what museum visitors from around the world will soon be able to experience.
news.excerpt: Together with Artheon, we're creating the world's largest VR database of art and cultural heritage

next.title: ThreeFold is Attending the AIBC Summit in Dubai
next.excerpt: Our co-founder Kristof will be giving a keynote and some of our team will be at the expo hall!
